channel.title: Advertising on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Advertising on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: In court filing, Google concedes the open web is in “rapid decline”
item.description: Google’s position on the state of the Internet is murky to say the least.

item.title: American Eagle Execs Take Victory Lap as Sales Surge: “Sydney Sweeney Sells Great Jeans”
item.description: The clothing retailer cited the Sweeney ad campaign and a partnership with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce as a driver of growth — and saw its share price surge 25 percent after hours.

item.title: American Eagle Execs Take Victory Lap as Sales Surge: “Sydney Sweeney Sells Great Jeans”
item.description: The clothing retailer cited the Sweeney ad campaign and a partnership with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce as a driver of growth — and saw its share price surge 25 percent after hours.

item.title: Why Fanatics Is Taking a Swing at the Sports Advertising Business
item.description: The sports commerce, gaming and entertainment company has tapped former Netflix and Snap ad sales chief Jeremi Gorman to lead its advertising effort.

item.title: Why Fanatics Is Taking a Swing at the Sports Advertising Business
item.description: The sports commerce, gaming and entertainment company has tapped former Netflix and Snap ad sales chief Jeremi Gorman to lead its advertising effort.

item.title: Peyton Manning Calls an Audible in Bud Light’s NFL Kickoff Campaign
item.description: The perennial football sponsor is once again working with the former quarterback as it begins its 2025-2026 series of ads.

item.title: Peyton Manning Calls an Audible in Bud Light’s NFL Kickoff Campaign
item.description: The perennial football sponsor is once again working with the former quarterback as it begins its 2025-2026 series of ads.

item.title: SiriusXM Launches Lower Cost Ad-Supported Plan in Bid to Take on Streaming Audio Giants
item.description: SiriusXM Play will cost under $7 and have an ad load that is about half of terrestrial radio stations.
